00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 
00031 if (!isset($_SESSION['memberID'])) { die(); }
00032 
00033 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00034 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging.inc.php';
00035 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/datagrid/simbio_dbgrid.inc.php';
00036 
00037 // page title
00038 $page_title = 'Member Loan List';
00039 
00040 // start the output buffering
00041 ob_start();
00042 // check if there is member ID
00043 if (isset($_SESSION['memberID']) AND !empty($_SESSION['memberID'])) {
00044     /* LOAN HISTORY LIST */
00045     $memberID = trim($_SESSION['memberID']);
00046     // table spec
00047     $table_spec = 'loan AS l
00048         LEFT JOIN item AS i ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00049         LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id';
00050 
00051     // create datagrid
00052     $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00053     $datagrid->setSQLColumn(
00054         'l.item_code AS \''.__('Item Code').'\'',
00055         'b.title AS \''.__('Title').'\'',
00056         'l.loan_date AS \''.__('Loan Date').'\'',
00057         'IF(return_date IS NULL, \'<i>'.__('Not Returned Yet').'</i>\', return_date) AS \''.__('Returned Date').'\'');
00058     $datagrid->setSQLorder("l.loan_date DESC");
00059 
00060     $criteria = 'l.member_id=\''.$dbs->escape_string($memberID).'\' ';
00061     // is there any search
00062     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00063         $keyword = $dbs->escape_string($_GET['keywords']);
00064         $criteria .= " AND (l.item_code LIKE '%$keyword%' OR b.title LIKE '%$keyword%')";
00065     }
00066     $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($criteria);
00067 
00068     // set table and table header attributes
00069     $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00070     $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00071     $datagrid->icon_edit = SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['theme'].'/edit.gif';
00072     // special properties
00073     $datagrid->using_AJAX = false;
00074     $datagrid->column_width = array(1 => '70%');
00075     $datagrid->disableSort('Return Date');
00076 
00077     // put the result into variables
00078     $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, false);
00079     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00080         $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00081         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00082     }
00083 
00084     echo $datagrid_result;
00085 }
00086 
00087 // get the buffered content
00088 $content = ob_get_clean();
00089 // include the page template
00090 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'/admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/notemplate_page_tpl.php';
00091 ?>
